Minesweeper

How to play:

Click any tile to begin.

Click subsequent tiles to reveal either an empty square or a bomb.

The goal is to reveal all non-bomb tiles without detonating a bomb.

Avoid revealing a bomb or else it will detonate and end the game.

Some tiles reveal multiple tiles. (is there a rule for how many or under what conditions?)

Tiles within a 1-tile distance of a bomb will display a number.

This number shows how many bombs are within a 1-tile distance of the tile.

The right-most counter is a timer, the left-most counter shows the number of flags you have left.

If you think a bomb exists on a tile, you may place a flag on top of it so that you may remember not to reveal it.

For a challenge, you can try to use a minimal amount of flags and try to finish as quickly as possible.
